title: Discretionary fiscal policy to reduce inflation

content.question: A discretionary fiscal policy action to reduce inflation in the short run would be to

choices.label: increase transfer payments to those on fixed incomes
increase taxes or decrease government spending
decrease taxes or increase government spending
increase taxes and the money supply

content.answer: increase taxes or decrease government spending
